title: Contribution to criticism in the excerpt

content.question: Which of the following contributed to Hubertâ€™s criticism in the excerpt of White Americans who visited Harlem in the 1920s?

choices.label: The inability of African American artists to influence popular culture
Ongoing public debates over how to improve race relations
Opposition to recruiting African American soldiers for the United States Army
Racial restrictions on the freedom of speech imposed during the First World War

content.answer: Ongoing public debates over how to improve race relations

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
